field.label: Install ETOpen Emerging Threats rules
field.help: ETOpen is a free open source set of Suricata rules whose coverage is more limited than ETPro.

field.label: Install ETPro Emerging Threats rules
field.help: ETPro for Suricata offers daily updates and extensive coverage of current malware threats.

field.label: Install Snort rules
field.help: Snort free Registered User or paid Subscriber rules.

field.label: Install Snort GPLv2 Community rules
field.help: The Snort Community Ruleset is a GPLv2 Talos-certified ruleset that is distributed free of charge without any Snort Subscriber License restrictions.

field.label: Install Feodo Tracker Botnet C2 IP rules
field.help: The Feodo Botnet C2 IP Ruleset contains Dridex and Emotet/Heodo botnet command and control servers (C&Cs) tracked by Feodo Tracker.

field.label: Install ABUSE.ch SSL Blacklist rules
field.help: The ABUSE.ch SSL Blacklist Ruleset contains the SSL cert fingerprints of all SSL certs blacklisted by ABUSE.ch.

field.label: Hide Deprecated Rules Categories
field.help: Hide deprecated rules categories in the GUI and remove them from the configuration.
